title: Diamond Janna Main LF ADC Main to Duo w/ on Smurf
body:
Add: "Janna Hentai", must have a mic and VOIP.

Looking to play around High Gold/Low Plat.

replies.body:
Depends on what level diamond you are.
I can easily carry silvers/low golds.  Afterwards in high gold - > plat it gets tougher without voice communication and just annoying.  The process is easier with a fellow smurf.

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
replies.body:
i always seem to think when a support main gets to diamond+ that they didn't do it alone...you're depending on your teammates and even your ADC to carry you.

It's not hard to master janna...but I've seen super good Janna players in silver even that are way better than Platinum janna mains...

The unfortunate thing is that silver janna doesn't have a reliable partner or just unlucky with his teammates as the plat/diamond janna who's duo's with a really good adc friend and gets lucky with good teammates.
